Class ActiveHNode

  • java.lang.Object

    public class ActiveHNode
extends LeafNode
implements LearningNode, java.io.Serializable
    Node that is "active" (i.e. growth can occur) in a Hoeffding tree
    Version:
    $Revision: 9705 $
